title: Computer Science and AI BSc Open Day in Cyprus
description: The Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence bachelor’s program at Neapolis University Pafos is opening its doors! Join us for our Open Day, where you will have the opportunity to meet the program’s professors and students and visit the campus.  The JetBrains Foundation supports this bachelor’s program and offers 15 fully funded scholarships for the most […]
author: Alena Gupaisova
excerpt: Join us for the Computer Science and AI BSc Open Day at Neapolis University Pafos! Learn more about the program curriculum and the JetBrains Foundation scholarships, meet the professors and students, and tour the campus.
text: The place for learning and teaching computer science your way JetBrains Academy Offline ProgramsComputer Science and AI BSc Open Day in Cyprus The Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence bachelor’s program at Neapolis University Pafos is opening its doors! Join us for our Open Day, where you will have the opportunity to meet the program’s professors and students and visit the campus.  The JetBrains Foundation supports this bachelor’s program and offers 15 fully funded scholarships for the most talented students. The scholarships cover tuition, accommodation, medical insurance, visa fees, and spending money (€300 per month).Find out more about the program here. This year’s admission starts on March 1, 2025. Mark your calendars When: March 15, 12:00 pm – 03:00 pm Where: Neapolis University Pafos, 2 Danais Avenue, Paphos 8042 Program 12:00 pm – 12:30 pmProgram introduction and Q&A Alexander S. Kulikov, DSc, Head of the Laboratory of Algorithms and Complexity Theory at JetBrains Research, Lecturer at Neapolis University Pafos (Discrete Mathematics)Natalia Kitaeva, Program Coordinator, JetBrains Academy12:30 pm – 01:00 pmFrom Engineering to Biology: Why You Should Master AIAlexandr Avdiushenko, PhD in Math Modeling, Project Manager for the JetBrains Education and Research team, Lecturer at Neapolis University Pafos01:00 pm – 01:20 pmCampus excursion01:30 pm – 03:00 pmNetworking with students and professorsWe’d be glad to meet you and answer all your questions.Your CSAI Scholarships team Subscribe to JetBrains Academy updates Discover more
html:
The place for learning and teaching computer science your way

JetBrains Academy Offline Programs

Computer Science and AI BSc Open Day in Cyprus

The Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence bachelor’s program at Neapolis University Pafos is opening its doors! Join us for our Open Day, where you will have the opportunity to meet the program’s professors and students and visit the campus. 

The JetBrains Foundation supports this bachelor’s program and offers 15 fully funded scholarships for the most talented students. The scholarships cover tuition, accommodation, medical insurance, visa fees, and spending money (€300 per month).
Find out more about the program here. This year’s admission starts on March 1, 2025.

Mark your calendars

When: March 15, 12:00 pm – 03:00 pm

Where: Neapolis University Pafos, 2 Danais Avenue, Paphos 8042

Program
